title: Permaban over a game I wasn't in?
body:
A couple days ago some guy disco nunu/T1 style run it down mid in my smurf's game - and has been for at least 35 game in s8. So I reported him and submitted a ticket, clearly the ingame report wasn't working.

Today I log in and my main accout has been perma banned, the only game referenced is linked which just so happens to be a game by the guy I reported.

I never played with this guy on my main, only my smurf though I submitted the ticket via my main. Riot somehow banned the reporting account rather than the actual troll, and as my account has had a previous 14 day ban this one is a perma ban.

The game linked in the ban was > https://matchhistory.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUW1/3853327336/61314224?tab=overview 

The 0/9 Nunu was the guy I reported and submitted a ticket about. 

The responding support staff was "Cpt Charisma" who has clearly shown a new level of ineptitude in banning the reporting player and not the reported player.
